code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const slides=[{id:1,img:process.env.PUBLIC_URL+"/slide1.png",title:"we make you spend less",subtitle:"zero down payment options"},{id:2,img:process.env.PUBLIC_URL+"/slide2.png",title:"trusted used cars",subtitle:"assured plus certified"},{id:3,img:process.env.PUBLIC_URL+"/slide3.png",title:"easy finance",subtitle:"finance options available"}];export default function Carousel(){const[index,setIndex]=useState(0);useEffect(()=>{const id=setInterval(()=>setIndex(i=>(i+1)%slides.length),4000);return()=>clearInterval(id);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"hero",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"carousel",children:[slides.map((s,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"slide "+(i===index?"active":""),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:s.img,alt:s.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hero-text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:s.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:s.subtitle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"primary",children:"Check eligibility"})]})]},s.id)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"arrow left",onClick:()=>setIndex(i=>(i-1+slides.length)%slides.length),children:"<"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"arrow right",onClick:()=>setIndex(i=>(i+1)%slides.length),children:">"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"dots",children:slides.map((_,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{onClick:()=>setIndex(i),className:i===index?"dot active":"dot"},i))})]})});}
